update_every.title: Update every
update_every.description: Data collection interval, measured in seconds.

source.title: Certificate source
source.description: The source of the certificate. Allowed schemes: https, tcp, tcp4, tcp6, udp, udp4, udp6, file, smtp.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: The timeout in seconds for the certificate retrieval.

check_revocation_status.title: Revocation status check
check_revocation_status.description: Whether to check the revocation status of the certificate.

days_until_expiration_warning.title: Days until warning
days_until_expiration_warning.description: Number of days before the alarm status is set to warning.

days_until_expiration_critical.title: Days until critical
days_until_expiration_critical.description: Number of days before the alarm status is set to critical.

tls_skip_verify.title: Skip TLS verification
tls_skip_verify.description: If set, TLS certificate verification will be skipped.

tls_ca.title: TLS CA
tls_ca.description: The path to the CA certificate file for TLS verification.

tls_cert.title: TLS certificate
tls_cert.description: The path to the client certificate file for TLS authentication.

tls_key.title: TLS key
tls_key.description: The path to the client key file for TLS authentication.

timeout.ui:help: Accepts decimals for precise control (e.g., type 1.5 for 1.5 seconds).
